channel.title: Pebble on lust.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Pebble on lust.dev

item.title: Is Pebble SDK Shipping?
item.description: Since learning about the Pebble almost a year ago, I knew it would be awesome. I’m a runner and maintainer of RunPartner. Stats about runs are important to me. For years I used various Forerunner watches. But, Pebble would be better. I’ve written SDK’s for websites to work with the Garmin watches (github) but I couldn’t change the code on the Forerunner with any neat new ideas. As a software engineer, this is irksome.
